Pentax PC313

About

lightweight and simple autofocus 35mm film camera

How to Use

Basic instructions for using the Pentax PC313:

  1. Load film (done already)
  2. Slide open lens cover to expose the lens, it should click in place
  3. Look through the viewfinder and frame your shot
  4. Press the shutter gently to take the picture

Specifications

  • Type: 35mm compact camera
  • Lens: 35mm f/4.5
  • Focus: Autofocus
  • Year: 1991
